sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROUSSILLON a province of France, in the Pyrenees, bounded on the eaſt by the Mediterranean ſea, on the weft by Cerdagne, on the north by Lower Languedoc, and on the ſouth by Catalonia, from which it is ſeparated by the Pyrenees. It is a fertile country, about 50 miles in length, and 2t in breadth, and remarkable for its great number of olive-trees. Perpignan is the capital town.
